column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Olwen - Thank you for the great review. I'm glad you enjoyed our ramen
column2: and I appreciate your kind words. Yes
column3: we are a franchise concept based out of Los Angeles
column4: though we strive very hard to follow our company's stringent recipes and preparation techniques. This ensures consistent quality across all of the JINYA locations in the U.S.
